Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored an unbeaten 103 off 97 balls
India won by 7 wickets with 51 balls remaining
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli expressed pride in the team's performance and resilience
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh's Tanzid Hasan scored 51 off 43 balls
India's Rohit Sharma scored 48 off 40 balls
India's Shubman Gill scored 53 off 55 balls
Bangladesh's Mushfiqur Rahim did not bat
